Description: Unsealed road with multiple roll overs each year.
narrow road with road trains operating on this road with narrow corners with blind crest

Location: Allen Rocks Rd & Hyden-Lake King Rd, Hyden
Description: Soon as exiting Allen rocks road, you are vulnerable to traffic coming over blind crest. You have to accelerate quickly incase  there is traffic coming behind you. when entering Allen rocks rd, you HV to cross oncoming traffic cresting a blind rise.
Oncoming traffic often are travelling too fast and cross to the wrong side of the road
